getAllContacts: SELECT CONTACT_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AGE, GENDER, JURISDICTION, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.CONTACTS ORDER BY FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME
getContactById: SELECT CONTACT_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AGE, GENDER, JURISDICTION, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.CONTACTS WHERE CONTACT_ID = ?
createContact: INSERT INTO DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.CONTACTS (FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AGE, GENDER, JURISDICTION) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
updateContact: UPDATE DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.CONTACTS SET FIRST_NAME = ?, LAST_NAME = ?, EMAIL = ?, PHONE = ?, DATE_OF_BIRTH = ?, AGE = ?, GENDER = ?, JURISDICTION = ?, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CONTACT_ID = ?
getAllBusinessTypes: SELECT BUSINESS_TYPE_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.BUSINESS_TYPES WHERE IS_ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY BUSINESS_NAME
getAllProductTypes: SELECT PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.PRODUCT_TYPES WHERE IS_ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME
